nodes.text: No. Abortion is legal, so they don't have to worry about what they do with a woman's sexuality. If they knew abortion was not an option, they would probably think twice before having sex with any woman they wanted.

So then, you think that the threat of criminalizing abortion will decrease sexual activity. In earlied posts you condemned wome's 'lust'. We gather that you think sexuality is a BAD thing. Why? Are you the avatar of either Saul of Tarsus or Augustine of Hippo?
